item.name: Agricola: All Creatures Big and Small
Battleship Galaxies: The Saturn Offensive Game Set
Call of Cthulhu: The Card Game
Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition)
Eclipse
item.comment: A space theme euro game with combat: A good combination for me. I never could get into TI3 due to the shear length of this acclaimed epic game. So this 1 is a very good alternative. There is resource management, technologies, space combat and to some extend diplomacy and table talk. A good balance of strong mechanics. I love it.

item.name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game
item.comment: Strong theme, beautiful artwork, and good mechanics. Very good with 2 players. Learning curve is steep unless you are familiar with LCGs which I wasn't, but after a few games it becomes very enjoyable.
